name: Volley Bomb
summary: The game Volley Bomb is a variation on the subject of volleyball. From volleyball it is necessary what to play the main difference not a ball, and a bomb. The purpose of game to blow up a bomb on the territory of the opponent. The bomb blows up, if it concerns a floor, there were more than three contacts of a bomb or time of burning of a fuse ended. Before the beginning of game choose quantity of bombs. Besides, you can choose complexity level, a way of moving and a place of the player. For a jump you should concern the screen in any place, besides, which is used for traffic control.
